label: 大納言
対訳語: a senior counselor on the Council of State (Daijōkan)
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: According to the Taihō Code there were to be four such counselors, but in 705 two senior counselors and two extracodal middle counselors (chūnagon 中納言) were appointed. [太政官、大宝律令]
